item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, May 2, 2025 at 12:35 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Altair at 50: Remembering the first Personal Computer (23 points | discuss)
2. Apple App Store guidelines remove ban on encouraging external payments in US (69 points | 26 comments)
3. Irish privacy watchdog hits TikTok with Є530M fine over data transfers to China (141 points | 80 comments)
4. How to live an intellectually rich life (17 points | 3 comments)

7. Meta's Reality Labs Has Now Lost over $60B Since 2020 (34 points | 34 comments)
8. Claude Integrations (609 points | 217 comments)
9. Bloom Filters (87 points | 26 comments)
10. Redis is open source again (1648 points | 614 comments)

13. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (May 2025) (195 points | 208 comments)
14. Vatican Observatory (11 points | 1 comment)
15. Felix86: Run x86-64 programs on RISC-V Linux (96 points | 23 comments)

20. LLMs for Engineering: Teaching Models to Design High Powered Rockets (83 points | 26 comments)

22. New Study: Waymo is reducing serious crashes and making streets safer (308 points | 308 comments)
23. The Totalitarian Buddhist Who Beat SIM City (2010) (17 points | 2 comments)
24. DECtalk Archive (87 points | 15 comments)

26. New species of methane-producing archaea discovered in the human gut (15 points | discuss)
27. Show HN: Kubetail – Real-time log search for Kubernetes (96 points | 29 comments)
28. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (May 2025) (86 points | 206 comments)
29. xAI dev leaks API key for private SpaceX, Tesla LLMs (176 points | 43 comments)
30. Millihertz 5 Mechanical Computer (2022) (91 points | 14 comments)
